item.title: 意大利自 2021 年以来首次获得惠誉评级，为梅洛尼喝彩
item.description: 由于意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府在削减赤字方面做出的努力，意大利获得了惠誉评级公司自 2021 年以来的首次评级上调。【原文：Italy won its first upgrade from Fitch Ratings since 2021 as the credit assessor rewarded Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni’s government for its deficit-cutting efforts.】

item.title: 阿波罗、Diameter 看空汽车零部件公司 First Brands
item.description: 据知情人士透露，投资公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Investment firms Apollo Global Management Inc. and Diameter Capital Partners have both closed their bets against the debt of troubled auto parts supplier First Brands Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 预算风险增加，穆迪下调波兰评级展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）表示，可能会降低波兰的信用评级，因为波兰正在努力克服政治紧张局势，而政治紧张局势使得抑制预算赤字的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：Moody’s Ratings signaled it may lower Poland’s credit score as the country struggles to overcome political tensions complicating efforts to curb its budget deficit.】

item.title: 尽管受到批评，美国仍希望向以色列出售 60 亿美元武器
item.description: 尽管本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理对卡塔尔的袭击及其在加沙的军事行动遭到越来越多的批评，但特朗普政府仍在推动向以色列出售 60 亿美元的武器。【原文：The Trump administration is pushing to sell $6 billion in weapons to Israel, people familiar with the matter said, a move that would bolster defense ties despite mounting criticism over Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s attack on Qatar and his military campaign in Gaza.】

item.title: 人权组织呼吁调查世界银行医院资金问题
item.description: 50 多个人权组织、非营利组织和国际发展专家援引彭博新闻社有关涉嫌虐待病人的文章，呼吁世界银行调查其在非洲和亚洲的医疗投资。【原文：More than 50 human rights organizations, nonprofits and international development experts are calling on the World Bank to investigate its health-care investments in Africa and Asia, citing Bloomberg News articles about alleged patient abuses.】

item.title: 法国评级再次下调，财政状况令人担忧
item.description: 法国的信用评级在一周内第二次被下调，这凸显了在长期政治危机中法国公共财政前景的恶化。【原文：France’s credit rating was downgraded for the second time in a week, underscoring a deterioration in the outlook for its public finances amid a prolonged political crisis.】

item.title: Genuine Parts 考虑分拆汽车业务
item.description: Genuine Parts Co.是一家工业公司，最近与激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）达成和解。【原文：Genuine Parts Co., an industrials company that recently settled with activist investor Elliott Investment Management, is considering a breakup, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国银行称私人信贷面临压力上升的 "明显迹象
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一份报告称，随着违约率的上升以及越来越多的借款人选择推迟现金利息支付，1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场正出现压力增大的迹象。【原文：Signs of elevated stress are emerging within the $1.7 trillion private credit market as default rates are rising and more borrowers are choosing to defer cash interest payments, according to a Bank of America Corp. report.】

item.title: 美联储推动 2021 年式风险反弹，华尔街 "涅槃 "在即
item.description: 美联储本周为华尔街的涨势注入了新的燃料，推动 9 月份出现了自 2021 年狂潮以来最广泛的跨资产大涨；恐惧在退却，贪婪在释放。【原文：The Federal Reserve poured fresh fuel on the Wall Street rally this week, pushing September toward the broadest cross-asset surge since the 2021 frenzy — with fear in retreat and greed unleashed.】

item.title: 据说便利店业主 Yesway 将在首次公开募股中寻求 3 亿美元投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 Brookwood Financial Partners 支持的便利店运营商 Yesway Inc.【原文：Yesway Inc., a convenience store operator backed by Brookwood Financial Partners, is reviving plans for an initial public offering after originally filing for one in 2021, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Aptiv 考虑出售配电部门而非分拆上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Aptiv Plc 公司今年 1 月宣布了一项配电系统业务分拆计划，目前正在为该业务部门寻找潜在买家。【原文：Aptiv Plc, which in January announced a spinoff plan for its electrical distribution systems business, is now reaching out to potential buyers for the unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 甲骨文与 Meta 就 200 亿美元人工智能云计算交易进行谈判
item.description: 甲骨文公司正在与 Meta Platforms 公司商讨一项价值约 200 亿美元的云计算交易，进一步证明该公司已成为重要的基础设施供应商。【原文：Oracle Corp. is in discussions with Meta Platforms Inc. for a cloud computing deal worth about $20 billion, providing further evidence that the company has become a significant infrastructure provider.】

item.title: 旅游软件公司纳凡申请首次公开募股，显示亏损不断增加
item.description: 商务旅行和费用管理软件制造商 Navan Inc.【原文：Navan Inc. a business travel and expense management software maker, filed publicly for a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 首只巨灾债券 ETF 可能只需要一个支撑点
item.description:
将某项资产纳入 ETF 包装并不一定意味着投资者就会接受它。【原文：

Just because an asset can be put into the ETF wrapper doesn’t necessarily mean that investors will embrace it.

】

item.title: 由 H&F 支持的汽车维修公司 Caliber 考虑最快明年上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由 Hellman & Friedman 支持的汽车碰撞维修公司 Caliber Holdings Inc.【原文：Caliber Holdings Inc., an auto collision repair firm backed by Hellman & Friedman, is weighing its initial public offering as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 微软将于 10 月 3 日上调美国 Xbox 售价 20 至 70 美元不等
item.description: 微软公司周五表示，将于10月3日提高其旗舰产品Xbox S系列和X系列视频游戏机的价格，理由是宏观经济环境发生了变化。【原文：Microsoft Corp. on Friday said it is increasing the prices of its flagship Xbox Series S and Series X video game consoles on Oct. 3, citing changes in the macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: 试管婴儿中断，Kindbody 的故事：生育水疗中心
item.description:
Kindbody吸引了数百万渴望颠覆生育行业的投资者。但前员工描述说，公司有时走了太多弯路。【原文：

Kindbody attracted millions from investors eager to disrupt the fertility industry. But former employees describe a company that at times cut too many corners.

】

item.title: 秘鲁人民中央银行行长发出潜在继任者信号
item.description: 秘鲁央行行长胡里奥-贝拉德（Julio Velarde）即将迎来执掌拉美最稳定货币的 20 周年纪念日，现在他开始透露希望谁来接替他。【原文：Peru’s central bank chief Julio Velarde will soon mark 20 years commanding Latin America’s most stable currency — and is now beginning to signal who he would like to succeed him.】

item.title: 马斯克的 XAI 公司以 2000 亿美元估值融资 100 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉该交易的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 已以 2,000 亿美元的估值筹集到新资金，成为全球最有价值的初创公司之一。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI has raised new funding at a $200 billion valuation, according to a person familiar with the deal, making it one of the world’s most valuable startups.】

item.title: 加元的 "迷你美元 "地位日益凸显，岌岌可危
item.description: 据加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）称，加元与美元的联系日益紧密，随着美元走软，加元兑全球同类货币有走低的风险。【原文：The Canadian dollar’s increasingly tight linkage to the US dollar risks dragging the loonie lower against global peers as the greenback weakens, according to RBC Capital Markets.】

item.title: 特朗普将与土耳其埃尔多安会面讨论 F-35 战斗机争端
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将于下周在华盛顿会见土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan），讨论波音公司飞机的销售问题，并努力解决使北约盟国之间关系恶化的F-35隐形战斗机争端。【原文：President Donald Trump said he’ll meet Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan in Washington next week to discuss the sale of Boeing Co. aircraft as well as efforts to resolve a dispute over F-35 stealth fighters that soured ties between the NATO allies.】

item.title: 高盛交易台推出流动性 IPO 篮子，上市数量激增
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. ）的篮子组（Basketets Group）是该行交易台的一部分，它正在推出一种名为 Liquid IPO Index 的产品，在大量美国公司上市的背景下，该产品将允许投资者跟踪近期上市公司股票的表现。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s baskets group, part of the bank’s trading desk, is introducing a product called the Liquid IPO Index that will allow investors to track the performance of recent listings amid a flood of US companies going public.】

item.title: 拜登缓刑后，美国证券交易委员会放弃艾伦-斯坦福控制器案
item.description: 在美国前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）缩短了一名高管的刑期之后，美国证券交易委员会撤销了对他长达 16 年之久的起诉，该高管因协助 R. Allen Stanford 实施价值 70 亿美元的庞氏骗局而被定罪。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is dropping its 16-year-old case against an executive convicted of aiding R. Allen Stanford’s $7 billion Ponzi scheme after former President Joe Biden cut short his prison term.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘用埃斯蒙德和弗莱明负责消费零售交易
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. hired a pair of managing directors for its consumer and retail investment banking team.】

item.title: 芝加哥市长权衡如何弥补财政赤字，债券处罚范围扩大
item.description: 芝加哥市市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）为弥补未来一年高达 10 亿美元的财政赤字，正在研究各种方案，投资者要求以更高的溢价购买芝加哥市政债券。【原文：Investors are demanding higher premiums to buy Chicago muni bonds as Mayor Brandon Johnson wades through a myriad of options to close a deficit that tops $1 billion for the year ahead.】

item.title: Pattern 集团 3 亿美元首次公开募股后股价下跌 8.9
item.description: Pattern Group Inc.是一家在亚马逊公司等市场上转售商品的电子商务公司，该公司及其部分投资者在首次公开募股中筹集了 3 亿美元，在其首个交易日跌幅高达 8.9%。【原文：Pattern Group Inc., an e-commerce firm that resells goods on marketplaces such as Amazon.com Inc., fell as much as 8.9% in its inaugural trading day, after the company and some of its investors raised $300 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 市场消化特朗普与习近平通话细节，美国谷物价格回落
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国总统习近平通电话后，周五美国农作物市场全线下跌。【原文：US crop markets were down across the board Friday following a phone call between President Donald Trump and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 特朗普在与习近平通话后表示，嘀嗒出行协议已接近批准
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在与中国总统习近平通电话后表示，中美两国更接近于就向美国投资者出售 TikTok 在美国的业务达成最终协议。【原文：The US and China are closer to final agreement on a sale of TikTok’s US operations to American investors, President Donald Trump said after a call with his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping that focused in part on a deal to spare the popular app from a ban.】

item.title: 巴里-卡乐堡寄望亚洲促进巧克力销售增长
item.description: 全球最大的巧克力供应商之一巴里-卡乐堡公司（Barry Callebaut AG）正将增长的赌注押在亚洲，同时减少对成本高昂的可可豆的依赖，以抵御价格冲击。【原文：Barry Callebaut AG, one of the world’s largest chocolate suppliers, is betting on Asia for growth, while reducing its reliance on costly cocoa beans to weather price shocks.】

item.title: 贬值恐慌加剧，米莱为比索辩护至 "最后一美元
item.description: 比索挤兑迫使阿根廷耗尽硬通货储备并加强对市场的控制，因为投资者的加速撤离有可能破坏哈维尔-米莱伊总统的稳定计划，并使经济再次陷入危机。【原文：A run on the peso is forcing Argentina to burn through its hard-currency reserves and tighten its grip on markets as an accelerating investor exodus threatens to derail President Javier Milei’s stabilization plan and throw the economy back into crisis once again.】
